To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private ThreeInside _threeinside;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_threeinside = ThreeInside(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_threeinside.IsReady)
{
    var period = _threeinside.Period.Value;
    var current = _threeinside.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.threeinside = self.ThreeInside(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.threeinside.IsReady:
    period = self.threeinside.Period.Value
    current = self.threeinside.Current.Value
